Package com.soa.message.handler.script

This package includes a scripting API for message (policy) handlers.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MessageContext
    Represents an message handler context in a scripted environment.
    MessageHandlerScriptVariables
    Lists the variables provided as context to message handler scripts.

Package com.soa.message.handler.script Description

This package includes a scripting API for message (policy) handlers. Refer to the variables of each script domain in the product for details on how to gain access to objects listed in this package.
